content.question: In the first paragraph, the speaker suggests that “the man of lettered leisure” has a

choices.label: choice regarding his attitude toward involvement
desire to become better than he is
valid reason to hold himself apart from others

content.answer: choice regarding his attitude toward involvement

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
